monitoringPlanCommentData.monitoringPlanComment: CHANGED SO2, NOX, CO2 MONITORS AND PROBE ON THE FGD STACK.  A CAL ERROR, LINEARITY, RATA, CYCLE RESPONSE TEST AND CAL DRIFT TEST ALL PASSED.
Changed the range of low SO2 from 60 to 100 ppm due to not having a majority of readings in the proper range during the annual monitor range analysis.
